name: alejandroadam
text: this is the first one I read. the arc after this is great also. cus I live quite close to mojave. (in ridgecrest)

name: andrew_
text:
you live in Ridgecrest? I lived in Apple Valley, and Burroughs High School was in our tennis league.

Even though you dudes are in another county.

name: ibetso
text: Eagle River?

name: andrew_
text: I don't know if what you're saying means anything. I don't know what Eagle River is.

name: lucid
text:
It's an obscure Hot Shots reference.

And it was hilarious .

name: alejandroadam
text: we are technically in two counties... we are that far into the nothing that is inyo/kern

name: bsidestarchild
text: Doctor Kisses

name: ssddr
text: Slow-lane

name: mastronaut
text: Bite-Bite

name: snowman
text: True, fellas.  All true.

name: leftsaidtim
text: A comment left by leftsaidtim was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tasteful, mattbeetee, mercuri0us, mystkmanat, shortside40, allknowingpants, jmmfgd)

name: zem
text: was this comment more popular because of the name or the avatar? i think it's the avatar.

name: leftsaidtim
text: It's clearly the avatar. Beatniks got nothin on the wu.

name: badganjil
text: Aaaaahahahah that one was my favorite as well.

name: semiquaver
text: Check up on Dr. Kisses' lung why don't you.

name: snowman
text: I have seen your icon...dozens of times, and I just realized that his ear pops out. I always just thought he was winking, which was awesome enough.

name: donnatron
text: Wow...I never noticed until I read YOUR comment

name: semiquaver
text: I prefer to have an icon with multiple layers of meaning that unfold over multiple readings.

name: killingthejay
text: I'M SO SORRY

name: donnatron
text: I had to chubby for the avatar, even though I hate it when people leave comments like this one I'm leaving right now

name: william
text: best assortment of pet names ever compiled, ever.

name: hannah
text: seconded with vigour.

name: zem
text: next time I name a pet I will name it dr. kisses

name: tetrisattack
text: Dr. Kisses is the name of my son.

name: i_love_kate
text: Dr. Kisses Attack? I don't know, man, that sounds like the kind of doctor that parents studiously avoid.

name: tasteful
text: i promise you infinite chubbies and infinite girlfriends

name: i_love_kate
text: One year later, and this was always to be an empty promise.

name: undyingsong
text: It is definitely not tasteful to make promises that you cannot keep. I'm sorry for the infinite number of losses this situation has caused you, i_love_kate.

name: epicurus
text: You going to NAME him "Doctor" or will you force them to earn a doctorate? Either way big ups.

name: cuddlefish
text: I also enjoyed 'Bite-Bite'

name: andrew_
text: agreed.

name: presterjohn
text: Naming all of the 34 robotic dogs awarded him is the essence of Ray.

name: killwithkarate
text: My two favourite pet names for just about anyone (animal or human) are Bite-Bite and Doctor Kisses.  Also, I occasionally proclaim to my boyfriend that I have a doctorate in kisses.

name: i_love_kate
text: Is it plausible that your name is a Joanna Newsom reference? I think it is.

name: cousinted
text: Note that the two AIBOs that will play a part in later storylines are the last two Ray mentions. When will we next hear from Slow-Lane?

name: jonmw
text: Statistically speaking, how long will Achewood have to continue before we have revisited all of the AIBOs named in this strip?

name: deusoma
text: Judging by how many times individual AIBOs have come up since then? About four million years.

name: sumbitches
text: My podiatrists name is Dr. Kisses.  Dr. Herbert Kisses.

name: random_shorts
text:
I REALLY want to believe that.

But I don't. Believe it, that is.

name: chomopomomofo
text: Xena, Bessie, Creepy, Spore, Nug, Evangeline, Axegrinder, SlowDance, Teetertot, Nancy Drew, Penguin, DanceMaster and Reginald.

name: tekende
text:
Axegrinder

Why would you think of that though
Why would you think of that

name: aelindil
text: Why WOULDN'T you?

name: f1shst1ck
text: Thats an amazing track suit

name: minortough
text: You just KNOW that he's still wearing just a thong on his bottoms.

name: i_love_kate
text: Wait... Does he actually kill Doctor Kisses? He found it decidedly hard, whichever way he went.

name: clockworkorange
text: He must have, as Roast Beef did get robotic AIBO organs.

name: rowboat
text: As to the Leonard Cohen reference in the alt text, it's anyone's guess. Onstad must have been listening to Beef's workout tape, in which case he must have heard this line about fourteen times in the last hour.

name: mashisoyo
text: Except that the alt text is from 'Hey, that's no way to say goodbye', and Beef's workout tape is 'Suzanne' repeated.

name: foxtrotamend
text: This reminds me of the myth of Acthaeon where all of his dogs are named before they rip him to shreds.

name: cailetshadow
text: Teodor is not so sure he wants to be pegged as the kind of guy who throws "Aibo Parties"

name: cracklewater
text: But Teodor is pretty sure he wants to be pegged, someday.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: c'mon..that many aibos is just ridiculous. which is the whole point.

name: random_shorts
text: Unless the whole point is actually why the hell you would come up with 34 specific names for each individual identical AIBO and, having done so, how exactly you would plan to tell them apart.

name: baryonyx
text: The way Ray cuts Teodor off is really the best thing about this strip. He is just running conversational circles around the man.

name: tasteful
text: yes, i was going to say. "I have 34 AIBOs." he is not sugarcoating the situation at all

name: hyetal
text: I hear this strip as if it has a lot of energy, the characters are shouting, perhaps there is music in the background, and then Ray deadpans, " I have 34 AIBOs. "

name: mrklaw
text: I WILL LOVE YOU FOREVER, DR. KISSES.

name: kenyot
text: How would he tell Fingers from Doctor Kisses, for example? Name Tags? I guess what I'm getting at is, was there any reason for naming an AIBO Fingers? Other than it being RAW?.

name: spinynorman
text: I'm guessing he would differentiate between the robot dogs by a series of small novelty hats.

name: jonmw
text: I prefer to imagine that he is able to tell them apart quite easily due to his intense ability to PAY ATTENTION.

name: nucleargeranium
text: Doctor kisses passes away for Beef.

name: mustakrakesh
text: I changed the name of my dog to Melon...he is so confused.

name: gournal
text:
before I knew what achewood was I asked my friend what a good name would be for a puppy. his answers were:

schmookums
faggot
and... melon farmer

name: gournal
text: 3 weeks later i now remember that it was scrumpkins, not schmookums. i feel like scrumpkins is better in the way that it is way worse.

name: wittyname
text: In this comic, Téodor falsely assumes that once you get rich and famous you get a stable of women, all of which birth your children.

name: dancemanleo
text: i almost got named my dog dr. kisses, however the girlfriend had different intentions

name: berami
text: I love how little-girlish half the names are, while the rest are generic Parents of your childhood friends names".

name: unbeknowneth
text: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xoXI1zZbGIc]Magic Sam?[/url

name: unbeknowneth
text: screw you, me. Fuck you! (me.)

name: soticoto
text: Sweet Spot can ejaculate.
